description._content: Image taken from: Title: "La Pologne historique, littéraire, monumentale et illustrée ... Rédigée par une Société de littérateurs, sous la direction de L. Chodzko, ancien rédacteur en chef de la Pologne historique, littéraire, monumentale et pittoresque. [With plates, including portraits and maps.]" Author: CHODŹKO, Jakób Leonard. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 10291.f.9.", "British Library HMNTS C.155.g.13." Page: 570 Place of Publishing: Paris Date of Publishing: 1839 Issuance: monographic Identifier: 000690283 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals. If you wish to purchase a high quality copy of the page that this image is drawn from, please order it here.
